languages.text: "Трон упаси, да разве может столь низкий простолюдин вроде меня угрожать самому Вольному Вашеству? Ни в жизнь. И опасаюсь я малец, матушкой клянусь. Да только мой хозяин тоже человек не последний человек в Просторе — а я его это, как его... посол! Таких, говорят, честные люди не убивают".

traits.locale_text: "Трон упаси, да разве может столь низкий смерд вроде меня угрожать самому Вольному Вашеству? Ни в жизнь. И опасаюсь я малец, матушкой клянусь. Да только мой хозяин тоже человек не последний человек в Коронусе — а я его это, как его... посол! таких, говорят, честные люди не убивают".

languages.text: "Throne take me, could a lowly commoner like me pose any threat to Your Rogue Traderness? Not in a million years. I'm a cowardly lad, I swear on my mother's life. It's just my boss is a pretty important man in the Expanse, and I'm his... his envoy, if you like! And they say that honest folk don't go around killing envoys."
languages.original_text: "Трон упаси, да разве может столь низкий простолюдин вроде меня угрожать самому Вольному Вашеству? Ни в жизнь. И опасаюсь я малец, матушкой клянусь. Да только мой хозяин тоже человек не последний человек в Просторе — а я его это, как его... посол! Таких, говорят, честные люди не убивают".

It's just my boss is a pretty important man in the Expanse, and I'm his... his envoy, if you like! And they say that honest folk don't go around killing envoys."

It's just my boss is a pretty important man in the Expanse, and I'm his... his envoy, if you like! And they say that honest folk don't go around killing envoys."

"Throne take me, could a lowly commoner like me pose any threat to Your Rogue Traderness? Not in a million years. I'm a cowardly lad, I swear on my mother's life. It's just my boss is a pretty important man in the Expanse, and I'm his... his envoy, if you like! And they say that honest folk don't go around killing envoys."

"Throne take me, could a lowly commoner like me pose any threat to Your Rogue Traderness? Not in a million years. I'm a cowardly lad, I swear on my mother's life. It's just my boss is a pretty important man in the Expanse, and I'm his... his envoy, if you like! And they say that honest folk don't go around killing envoys."

languages.text: “黄金王座在上，像我这种平头老百姓，真的能对行商浪人构成威胁吗？给我一百个胆子也不够用啊。我只是个懦弱的小伙子，我可以拿我妈的命来发誓。只不过，我的老板在科罗努斯扩区是个相当重要的人物，而我是他的……我是他的特使，如果你愿意这么称呼的话！大家都说，正人君子不斩来使。”
languages.original_text: "Throne take me, could a lowly commoner like me pose any threat to Your Rogue Traderness? Not in a million years. I'm a cowardly lad, I swear on my mother's life. It's just my boss is a pretty important man in the Expanse, and I'm his... his envoy, if you like! And they say that honest folk don't go around killing envoys."

traits.locale_text: “黄金王座在上，像我这种平头老百姓，真的能对行商浪人构成威胁吗？给我一百个胆子也不够用啊。我只是个懦弱的小伙子，我可以拿我妈的命来发誓。只不过，我的老板在科罗努斯扩区是个相当重要的人物，而我是他的……我是他的特使，如果你愿意这么称呼的话！大家都说，正人君子不斩来使。”

languages.text: «Que el Trono me lleve, ¿cómo iba un mequetrefe como yo a ser una amenaza a su Comercianteza? Ni en un millón de años. Soy un cobarde, lo juro por mi madre. Pero es que mi jefe es un pez gordo en la Extensión y yo soy su... ¡su emisario, por así decirlo! Dicen que la gente decente no mata a los emisarios».
languages.original_text: "Throne take me, could a lowly commoner like me pose any threat to Your Rogue Traderness? Not in a million years. I'm a cowardly lad, I swear on my mother's life. It's just my boss is a pretty important man in the Expanse, and I'm his... his envoy, if you like! And they say that honest folk don't go around killing envoys."

traits.locale_text: «Que el Trono me lleve, ¿cómo iba un mequetrefe como yo a ser una amenaza a su Comercianteza? Ni en un millón de años. Soy un cobarde, lo juro por mi madre. Pero es que mi jefe es un pez gordo en la Extensión y yo soy su... ¡su emisario, por así decirlo! Dicen que la gente decente no mata a los emisarios».

languages.text: 「王座の導きだな、俺みたいな卑しい庶民が自由開拓者様を脅せるなんてさあ？百万年に一度もないね。俺は臆病者だ、母親に誓ってな。ボスがエクスパンスではちょっとした大物ってだけだ。そんで俺はボスの…ボスの使節ってとこだな！誠実な皆々様なら、使者を殺そうとはしないよな」
languages.original_text: "Throne take me, could a lowly commoner like me pose any threat to Your Rogue Traderness? Not in a million years. I'm a cowardly lad, I swear on my mother's life. It's just my boss is a pretty important man in the Expanse, and I'm his... his envoy, if you like! And they say that honest folk don't go around killing envoys."

traits.locale_text: 「王座の導きだな、俺みたいな卑しい庶民が自由開拓者様を脅せるなんてさあ？百万年に一度もないね。俺は臆病者だ、母親に誓ってな。ボスがエクスパンスではちょっとした大物ってだけだ。そんで俺はボスの…ボスの使節ってとこだな！誠実な皆々様なら、使者を殺そうとはしないよな」

languages.text: « Par le Trône, est-ce qu'un moins que rien comme moi représente vraiment une menace pour Votre Libre-marchanditude ? Ça m'étonnerait beaucoup. Je suis qu'un lâche, je vous le jure sur la tête de ma pauvre maman, mais mon patron est un homme très important dans les Étendues et il a fait de moi son... émissaire, disons ! Et à ce qu'on dit, les honnêtes gens ont pas pour habitude de tuer les émissaires. »
languages.original_text: "Throne take me, could a lowly commoner like me pose any threat to Your Rogue Traderness? Not in a million years. I'm a cowardly lad, I swear on my mother's life. It's just my boss is a pretty important man in the Expanse, and I'm his... his envoy, if you like! And they say that honest folk don't go around killing envoys."

traits.locale_text: « Par le Trône, est-ce qu'un moins que rien comme moi représente vraiment une menace pour Votre Libre-marchanditude ? Ça m'étonnerait beaucoup. Je suis qu'un lâche, je vous le jure sur la tête de ma pauvre maman, mais mon patron est un homme très important dans les Étendues et il a fait de moi son... émissaire, disons ! Et à ce qu'on dit, les honnêtes gens ont pas pour habitude de tuer les émissaires. »

languages.text: "Der Thron hole mich, kann denn ein einfacher Bürgerlicher wie ich überhaupt eine Bedrohung für Eure Freihändlerschaft darstellen? Nicht in einer Million Jahren. Ich bin ein Feigling, das schwöre ich beim Leben meiner Mutter. Aber mein Boss ist ein ziemlich wichtiger Mann in der Ausdehnung, und ich bin ... sein Gesandter sozusagen. Und es heißt, ehrbare Leute würden keine Gesandten umbringen."
languages.original_text: "Throne take me, could a lowly commoner like me pose any threat to Your Rogue Traderness? Not in a million years. I'm a cowardly lad, I swear on my mother's life. It's just my boss is a pretty important man in the Expanse, and I'm his... his envoy, if you like! And they say that honest folk don't go around killing envoys."

Und es heißt, ehrbare Leute würden keine Gesandten umbringen."

languages.text: "Taht canımı alsın! Benim gibi âciz bir yurttaş, Hür Tacir Hazretleri'ne nasıl bir tehdit oluşturabilir? Mümkün değil. Anam ölsün ki ödleğin tekiyim ben. Ama patronum, Enginlik'te hayli önemli bir şahıstır. Ben de onun... Elçisiyim, evet! Derler ki elçiye zeval olmazmış."
languages.original_text: "Throne take me, could a lowly commoner like me pose any threat to Your Rogue Traderness? Not in a million years. I'm a cowardly lad, I swear on my mother's life. It's just my boss is a pretty important man in the Expanse, and I'm his... his envoy, if you like! And they say that honest folk don't go around killing envoys."
